title: What are the lyrics of Aigiri Nandini? - Quora

response.answer_text: lyrics of Aigiri Nandini Ayi giri nandini, nandhitha medhini,Viswa vinodhini nandanuthe,Girivara vindhya sirodhi nivasini,Vishnu Vilasini Jishnu nuthe,Bhagawathi hey sithi kanda kudumbini,Bhoori kudumbini bhoori kruthe,Jaya Jaya He Mahishasura Mardini, Ramya Kapardini Shaila Suthe--- 1 Suravara varshini, durdara darshini,Durmukhamarshani, harsha rathe,Tribhuvana poshini, Sankara thoshini,Kilbisisha moshini, ghosha rathe,Danuja niroshini, Dithisutha roshini,Durmatha soshini, Sindhu suthe,Jaya Jaya Hey Mahishasura Mardini, Ramya Kapardini Shaila Suthe--- 2 Ayi Jagadambha Madambha, Kadambha,Vana priya vasini, Hasarathe,Shikhari siromani, thunga Himalaya,Srunga nijalaya, madhyagathe,Madhu Madure, Mdhukaitabha banjini,Kaitabha banjini, rasa rathe,Jaya Jaya He Mahishasura…Ayi giri nandini, nandhitha medhini,Viswa vinodhini nandanuthe,Girivara vindhya sirodhi nivasini,Vishnu Vilasini Jishnu nuthe,Bhagawathi hey sithi kanda kudumbini,Bhoori kudumbini bhoori
